code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es6",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "allowJs": true,
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true
  },
  "include": ["./src/**/*"],
  "moduleResolution": "node",
  "experimentalDecorators": true,
  "skipPhysicalCheck": true
}
